message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $950000. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. However, I'm not willing to go below $930000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $930000.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not convinced that $930000 is the best price for me. I'm willing to pay $910000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the negotiations we've had so far.
